title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. God Bless Rush Limbaugh. People back to work are put at risk by propaganda of silence. The insanity of Texas coronavirus video revelations. What are the odds of Epstein’s associate making it to trial? Seattle and NYC about to see who has worse mayor. Marxism will always end in force. Mask bullying is meant to divide us. People are seeing through the Democrats’ chaos.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Let’s be grounded about masks and the lockdowns. Masks don’t stop influenza spread. Lockdowns haven’t helped. Freedom Foundation lawsuit against Washington for mask mandate. Mask orders are not laws. Gavin Newsom plans to shut down California again. Fear vs. herd immunity. Bad messaging has people thinking Cuomo did a good job dealing with the virus.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Democrats are in the business of selling their total control to you. Republicans sell tax cuts. The great fear of Trump will hurt all Americans. Lockdowns are mass casualty events. Today it’s a mask, what will it be tomorrow? Do you think Joe Biden could function as president? While we talk about masks and Biden, American flags and laws are gone. Masks are a method of leftist organizing. Counterproductive coronavirus decisions. Focus on independence of a nation and of conscience.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
